content: k1 leg k to first marker work heritage motif turn to second marker k to end of row repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have work in pattern until cuff measures 8 been worked finishing with a rs row you ending with an even row make a note of should have 16 18 20 stitches for the the last row completed heel heel flap gusset setup row split the first 28 32 36 divide the 16 18 20 stitches from the stitches onto two needles 14 16 18 on heel evenly onto two needles move the each needle place the remaining 28 32 28 32 36 instep stitches worked in 36 stitches on one needle you should now heritage pattern onto one needle have one free needle we will be working with working yarn and spare needle pick only on the 28 32 36 stitches placed on up and knit 14 16 18 stitches along the one needle page 3 ©rachel nutting woodland yarn co 2018 \heritage sock/ heel flap edge this will be referred to as end foot k to 0 2 4 stitches before needle 1 marker p 0 2 4 remove marker p to marker remove marker p 0 2 4 k 28 32 k to marker work in heritage pattern 36 stitches this will be your new end of starting on the next row from where you row left off k to marker this will be referred to as needle 2 shape toe again with working yarn and spare needle pick up and knit 14 16 18 stitches along setup row k1 ssk k 22 26 30 k2tog heel flap edge k the remainder of heel k1 pm k1 ssk k 22 26 30 k2tog k1 stitches this will be your new end of row this will be referred to as needle 3 row 1 k all stitches row 2 k1 ssk k to 3 before marker shape gusset k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 before end of row k2tog k1 row 1 k to marker work in heritage repeat row 1 and 2 until 16 stitches pattern to next marker k to end of row remain row 2 k to 3 stitches before the end of needle 1 k2tog k1 k to marker work in end toe heritage pattern k to marker k1 ssk k to end of row place the 16 stitches remaining evenly repeat row 1 and 2 until 14 16 18 amongst two needles cut a long tail and stitches remain on both needle 1 and 2 you using kitchener stitch graft the toe ending should now have 56 64 72 stitches total setup hold the two needles parallel with the same amount you started the pattern working yarn on back needle using a with darning needle insert needle into first stitch on front needle as if to purl pull yarn foot through leaving stitch on needle insert needle into first stitch on back needle as if foot
